testcase.title: Verify the OA states in the refine panel in Related Articles page for article with Multiple OA states

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Basic Search"

substeps.message: First selected option for dropDown Search Fields (row 1) is defined.
dropDown Search Fields (row 1)  Accession Number option is selected.
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is .
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is WOS:000440988200001.
textInput Search Term (row 0)  'WOS:000440988200001' text was entered.

steps.title: I perform search by field "Accession Number" with query "WOS:000440988200001" on page "Basic Search"
I access page "Full Record" for record number "1"
I click on find Related Records link on page "FullRecordpage"

substeps.message: The refine category: Open Access is expanded

steps.title: I expand the refine option "Open Access" on page "Result Summary page"
I refine with the "DOAJ Gold" in refine category "Open Access" on page "Related Records"
I open full record for "Biodegradation of Crude Oil and Corexit 9500 in Arctic Seawater"
I open overlay 'Journal Overlay' on page "Full Record"

substeps.message: Mouseover text -Gold and Bronze open access are identified as fully published articles available from the publisher without charge.

steps.title: I Mouseover on Free full text publisher
